name: Tri Tachyon Influence
desc: Local authorities have signed agreement with Tri Tachyon officials to support inital economical growth of economy, in exchange of montly income.

name: Rampant Crime
desc: Entire planet has entered into chaos and dissaray, unfortunaetly a lot of crime organizations saw this as opportunity to establish a crime syndicate. This syndicate is not a therat... at least yet.

name: Deal with the Devil
desc: We made a deal with crime lord, we allowed them to operate, in return for peace on this planet

name: Martial Law
desc: We won't make a deals with someone who descend so low in society. We will purge this disease from this planet

desc: We have quickly stabilized our market, which enabled us to eliminate crime organizations across planet.
